<script id="gtm-__utmzz-cookie-replicator">
  /**
   * UTMZ Cookie Replicator
   *
   * Makes a generally faithful representation of the old __utmz cookie
   * from Classic Analytics. Stores the data in a cookie named __utmzz.
   * Also sets a session cookie named __utmzzses.
   *
   * Data is stored in the __utmzz cookie in the following format; brackets
   * indicate optional data and are excluded from the stored string:
   *
   * utmcsr=SOURCE|utmcmd=MEDIUM[|utmccn=CAMPAIGN][|utmcct=CONTENT]
   * [|utmctr=TERM/KEYWORD]
   *
   * e.g.:
   *
   * utmcsr=example.com|utmcmd=affl-link|utmccn=foo|utmcct=bar|utmctr=biz
   *
   * Follows the same campaign assignment/overriding flow as Classic Analytics.
   */
  (function(document) {

    var referrer = {{Referrer}};
    var gaReferral = {
      'utmcsr': '(direct)',
      'utmcmd': '(none)',
      'utmccn': '(not set)'
    };
    var thisDomain = {{JS - Page Domain}};
    var referringDomain = {{JS - Referrer Domain}};
    var sessionCookie = {{CK - __utmzzses}};
    var cookieExpiration = new Date(+new Date() + 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30 * 6);
    var gaParams = parseGoogleParams({{Page Query String}} + '#' + {{Page Fragment}});
    var referringInfo = parseGaReferrer(referrer);
    var storedVals = {{CK - __utmz}} || {{CK - __utmzz}};
    var newCookieVals = [];
    var keyMap = {
      'utm_source': 'utmcsr',
      'utm_medium': 'utmcmd',
      'utm_campaign': 'utmccn',
      'utm_content': 'utmcct',
      'utm_term': 'utmctr',
      'gclid': 'utmgclid',
      'dclid': 'utmdclid'
    };
    var keyName,
      values,
      _val,
      _key,
      raw,
      key,
      len,
      i;

    if (sessionCookie && referrer.indexOf(thisDomain) > -1) {

      gaParams = null;
      referringInfo = null;

    }

    if (gaParams && (gaParams.utm_source || gaParams.gclid || gaParams.dclid)) {

      for (key in gaParams) {

        if (typeof gaParams[key] !== 'undefined') {

          keyName = keyMap[key];
          gaReferral[keyName] = gaParams[key];

        }

      }

      if (gaParams.gclid || gaParams.dclid) {

        gaReferral.utmcsr = 'google';
        gaReferral.utmcmd = gaReferral.utmgclid ? 'cpc' : 'cpm';

      }

    } else if (referringInfo) {

      gaReferral.utmcsr = referringInfo.source;
      gaReferral.utmcmd = referringInfo.medium;
      if (referringInfo.term) gaReferral.utmctr = referringInfo.term;

    } else if (storedVals) {

      values = {};
      raw = storedVals.split('|');
      len = raw.length;

      for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {

        _val = raw[i].split('=');
        _key = _val[0].split('.').pop();
        values[_key] = _val[1];

      }

      gaReferral = values;

    }

    for (key in gaReferral) {

      if (typeof gaReferral[key] !== 'undefined') {

        newCookieVals.push(key + '=' + gaReferral[key]);

      }

    }

    writeCookie_('__utmzz', newCookieVals.join('|'), cookieExpiration, '/', thisDomain);
    writeCookie_('__utmzzses', 1, null, '/', thisDomain);

    function parseGoogleParams(str) {

      var campaignParams = ['source', 'medium', 'campaign', 'term', 'content'];
      var regex = new RegExp('(utm_(' + campaignParams.join('|') + ')|(d|g)clid)=.*?([^&#]*|$)', 'gi');
      var gaParams = str.match(regex);
      var paramsObj,
        vals,
        len,
        i;

      if (gaParams) {

        paramsObj = {};
        len = gaParams.length;

        for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {

          vals = gaParams[i].split('=');

          if (vals) {

            paramsObj[vals[0]] = vals[1];

          }

        }

      }

      return paramsObj;

    }

        },
        'google': {
          'p': 'q',

        }
      };
      var a = document.createElement('a');
      var values = {};
      var searchEngine,
        termRegex,
        term;

      a.href = referrer;

      // Shim for the billion google search engines
      if (a.hostname.indexOf('google') > -1) {

        referringDomain = 'google';

      }

      if (searchEngines[referringDomain]) {

        searchEngine = searchEngines[referringDomain];
        termRegex = new RegExp(searchEngine.p + '=.*?([^&#]*|$)', 'gi');
        term = a.search.match(termRegex);

        values.source = searchEngine.n;

      var str = name + '=' + value + ';';

<script>
function saveEmailLocalStorage() {  
  var iframe = document.querySelector(".mfp-iframe");
  var myInput = iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById('tbEmail');
  localStorage.setItem("user-email", myInput.value);
}
function savePhoneLocalStorage() {  
  var iframe = document.querySelector(".mfp-iframe");
  var myInput = iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById('tbPhone');
  localStorage.setItem("user-phone", myInput.value);
}

setTimeout(function () {
  var iframe = document.querySelector(".mfp-iframe");
    var myInput = iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById('tbEmail');
    myInput.addEventListener('change', saveEmailLocalStorage);
    var myInput2 = iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById('tbPhone');
    myInput2.addEventListener('change', savePhoneLocalStorage); 
}, 3000);  
 
  

</script>

function addEvent(el, evt, fn) {
  if (el.addEventListener) {
    el.addEventListener(evt, fn);
  } else if (el.attachEvent) {
    el.attachEvent('on' + evt, function(evt) {
      fn.call(el, evt);
    });
  } else if (typeof el['on' + evt] === 'undefined' || el['on' + evt] === null) {
    el['on' + evt] = function(evt) {
      fn.call(el, evt);
    };
  }
}

addEvent(window, 'message', function(message) {

  //console.log("it worked - "+message.data+" - "+message.origin);
  var dataLayer = window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

  if (message.data === 'RAQsubmit' && message.origin === 'https://www.amawaterways.com') {
    dataLayer.push({
      'event': 'RAQsubmitted'
    });
  }

});  
</script>

parameter.value:
<script>
(function algoliaCFSearchObserver() {
    // 1. SELECTORS
    var CONTAINER_SELECTOR = '#where-when-bar';
    var WHERE_INPUT_SELECTOR = 'input[placeholder="Anywhere"]';
    var WHEN_INPUT_SELECTOR = 'input[placeholder="Anytime"]';
    var RESULTS_COUNT_SELECTOR = 'div.flex-row.items-center.justify-between.px-0.md\\:px-\\[\\.5rem\\] > div:first-child';
    
    var targetNode = document.querySelector(CONTAINER_SELECTOR);
    // Renamed the event key for better GTM hygiene (algolia_search_submit_subsequent)
    var EVENT_NAME = 'algolia_search_cruise_finder'; 

    if (!targetNode) {
      console.warn('GTM Observer: Target search container not found.');
      return;
    }
    
    // Function to get the current combined signature (ES5 function)
    var getCurrentSignature = function() {
        var whereInput = document.querySelector(WHERE_INPUT_SELECTOR);
        var whenInput = document.querySelector(WHEN_INPUT_SELECTOR);
        
        // Use standard ternary operator and var
        var whereValue = whereInput ? whereInput.value.trim() : '';
        var whenValue = whenInput ? whenInput.value.trim() : '';
        // Use string concatenation instead of template literals
        return whereValue + '|' + whenValue;
    };

    // 2. PERSISTENT STATE VARIABLE - Determine initial state on load
    var initialSignature = getCurrentSignature();
    var previousSignature;

    if (initialSignature === '|') {
        // If both inputs are empty, mark as a first search load state
        previousSignature = '|FIRST_LOAD|';
    } else {
        // If inputs are pre-filled (e.g., loaded from a direct search), use the actual values
        previousSignature = initialSignature;
    }

    // 3. CONFIGURATION - Watch for all DOM changes within the container
    var config = { 
        attributes: true, 
        childList: true, 
        subtree: true, 
        characterData: true 
    };

    // 4. CALLBACK FUNCTION - The core logic that fires on mutation
    var callback = function(mutationsList, observer) {
        // Use a standard function wrapper for setTimeout instead of an arrow function
        setTimeout(function() { 
            var newSignature = getCurrentSignature();
            
            // Check if the signature has actually changed AND is not the empty string "|"
            if (newSignature !== previousSignature && newSignature !== '|') {
                
                // DETERMINE SEARCH TYPE
                var searchType;
                if (previousSignature === '|FIRST_LOAD|') {
                    // This is the first action on the Cruise Finder page
                    searchType = 'initial';
                } else {
                    // This is a subsequent filter/refinement
                    searchType = 'refinement';
                }

                // Parse the new signature for the Data Layer push (using split and indexing, NOT destructuring)
                var signatureParts = newSignature.split('|');
                var newWhere = signatureParts[0];
                var newWhen = signatureParts[1];
                
                // SCRAPE THE RESULTS TEXT (Using standard var and logic)
                var resultsElement = document.querySelector(RESULTS_COUNT_SELECTOR);
                var resultsText = resultsElement ? resultsElement.textContent.trim().replace(/\s+/g, ' ') : '(Results Element Missing)';


                // PUSH to Data Layer
                window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                window.dataLayer.push({
                    'event': EVENT_NAME,
                    'search_type': searchType,
                    'algolia_where_query': newWhere,
                    'algolia_when_query': newWhen,
                    'algolia_search_results': resultsText,
                    'search_refinement_type': 'input'
                });

                // Update the state for the next change
                previousSignature = newSignature;
            }
        }, 750); // 500ms delay to allow results to update
    };

    // 5. ATTACH OBSERVER
    var observer = new MutationObserver(callback);
    observer.observe(targetNode, config);
    
})();
</script>

parameter.value:
<script>
  (function() {
    
    // --- ECMA5 HELPER FUNCTION for .closest() ---
    // Safely finds the closest ancestor element matching the selector (by class name)
    var findClosest = function (el, selector) {
        if (!el || !el.parentNode) return null;
        // Strip the leading dot from the class selector
        var classNameToFind = selector.substring(1); 
        
        // Loop upwards through the DOM tree
        for ( ; el && el !== document; el = el.parentNode ) {
            // Basic ECMA5 compatible check for the class name within the className string
            if (el.className && el.className.indexOf(classNameToFind) > -1) {
                return el;
            }
        }
        return null;
    };


    // 1. CONFIGURATION
    var MODAL_SELECTOR = 'div[role="dialog"]';
    var SELECTED_FILTER_SELECTOR = MODAL_SELECTOR + ' button[data-slot="button"][class*="bg-primary-01"][class*="text-section-primary"]';
    var EVENT_NAME = 'algolia_filter_interactions'; 
    var DELEGATION_TARGET = document.body;
    
    if (typeof MutationObserver === 'undefined') {
        console.warn('MutationObserver not supported. Passive dismiss tracking disabled.');
        return;
    }

    // Function to handle the data push when the modal is detected as closed
    var handleModalDismissal = function (modal) {
        
        // console.log('--- Passive Dismissal Tracker: Scanning Modal ---');

        var selectedFilters = modal.querySelectorAll(SELECTED_FILTER_SELECTOR);
        var selectedNames = [];
        var selectedGroups = [];

        // Use standard 'for' loop for NodeList iteration
        for (var i = 0; i < selectedFilters.length; i++) {
            var chip = selectedFilters[i];
            
            // --- 2. EXTRACT FILTER NAME (VALUE) ---
            var fullText = chip.textContent || '';
            var cleanedText = fullText.replace(/\s+/g, ' ').trim();  
            var filterName = cleanedText;

            // --- 3. EXTRACT FILTER GROUP (FACET) NAME ---
            var groupName = 'NA_Group_Error';
            
            // Find the container using the ECMA5 helper function
            var groupSection = findClosest(chip, '.relative.py-6');
            
            if (groupSection) {
                // Find the header button (assuming it is the first button child in the section)
                var headerButtons = groupSection.getElementsByTagName('button');
                var headerButton = headerButtons.length > 0 ? headerButtons[0] : null;
                
                if (headerButton) {
                    var groupNameContainer = headerButton.cloneNode(true);
                    
                    // Remove nested divs (count badge, SVG icon) using standard for loop
                    var divsToRemove = groupNameContainer.getElementsByTagName('div');
                    // Iterate backwards for safe removal while iterating
                    for (var j = divsToRemove.length - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
                        var div = divsToRemove[j];
                        div.parentNode.removeChild(div);
                    }
                    
                    groupName = groupNameContainer.textContent.trim();
                    
                    // Add group name to the array if it's unique (ECMA5 compatible check)
                    if (groupName) {
                         var groupIsUnique = true;
                         for (var k = 0; k < selectedGroups.length; k++) {
                             if (selectedGroups[k] === groupName) {
                                 groupIsUnique = false;
                                 break;
                             }
                         }
                         if (groupIsUnique) {
                             selectedGroups.push(groupName);
                         }
                    }
                }
            }

            // --- DEBUG LOGGING (Commented Out) ---
            // console.log('Filter [' + (i + 1) + ']:');
            // console.log('  Group Name: "' + groupName + '"');
            // console.log('  Filter Name: "' + filterName + '"');

            if (filterName) {
                selectedNames.push(filterName);
            }
        }

        // --- FINAL DATA LAYER PUSH ---
        if (selectedNames.length > 0) {
            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            window.dataLayer.push({
                'event': EVENT_NAME, 
                'algolia_filter_selections': selectedNames.join('|'),
                'algolia_filter_categories': selectedGroups.join('|'), 
                'algolia_filter_count': selectedNames.length,
                'filter_modal_results_count': 'NA_Passive_Exit', 
                'filter_action_type': 'passive_dismissal',
                'search_refinement_type': 'filter',
                'search_type': 'refinement',
            });
            
            // --- DEBUG LOGGING (Commented Out) ---
            // console.log('--- Passive Dismissal: Data Layer Push ---');
            // console.log('Filters List:', selectedNames.join('|'));
            // console.log('Groups List:', selectedGroups.join('|'));
            // console.log('Count:', selectedNames.length);
            // console.log('Action Type:', 'passive_dismissal');
        } else {
             // console.log('--- Passive Dismissal: No Filters Selected. No Data Layer Push. ---');
        }
    };


    // Observer logic 
    var modalFinderObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutationsList, observer) {
        var modal = document.querySelector(MODAL_SELECTOR);
        
        if (modal && modal.getAttribute('data-state') === 'open') {
            observer.disconnect();
            
            var stateObserver = new MutationObserver(function(stateMutationsList, stateObserver) {
                if (modal.getAttribute('data-state') === 'closed') {
                    stateObserver.disconnect();
                    
                    setTimeout(function() {
                        handleModalDismissal(modal);
                        modalFinderObserver.observe(DELEGATION_TARGET, { childList: true, subtree: true });
                    }, 300);  
                }
            });
            
            stateObserver.observe(modal, { attributes: true, attributeFilter: ['data-state'] });
        }
    });

    modalFinderObserver.observe(DELEGATION_TARGET, { childList: true, subtree: true });
    
  })();
</script>

<script>
(function() {
    // 1. CONFIGURATION
    var FILTER_BAR_ID = 'filter-bar';
    var EVENT_NAME = 'algolia_filter_bar_click';

    var filterBar = document.getElementById(FILTER_BAR_ID);

    if (!filterBar) {
      console.warn('GTM Filter Click Listener: Filter bar container not found.');
      return;
    }

    // 2. ATTACH EVENT DELEGATION LISTENER
    // Use the filter bar element to listen for all clicks inside it.
    filterBar.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
      var target = event.target;
      
      // Traverse up from the clicked element to find the parent <BUTTON> with data-slot="button"
      while (target && target !== filterBar) {
        if (target.tagName === 'BUTTON' && target.getAttribute('data-slot') === 'button') {
          break; // Found the button we care about
        }
        target = target.parentNode;
      }

      // Check if we actually found a relevant button
      if (target && target.tagName === 'BUTTON' && target !== filterBar) {
        
        // Get all text content, clean up excess whitespace, newlines, and tabs
        var fullText = target.textContent || '';
        var cleanedText = fullText.replace(/\s+/g, ' ').trim(); 

        // 3. EXCLUSION CHECK: Ignore the "Clear All" button
        if (cleanedText === 'Clear All') {
            return; 
        }

        // 4. EXTRACT FILTER NAME
        // Since the button contains an SVG icon and the name (e.g., "<svg>Art"), 
        // the filter name is reliably the last word in the cleaned text string.
        var filterName = cleanedText;
        
        // 5. PUSH to Data Layer
        if (filterName) {
          window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
          window.dataLayer.push({
            'event': 'algolia_filter_interactions',
            'algolia_filter_selections': filterName,
            'search_refinement_type': 'filter',
            'search_type': 'refinement'
          });
        }
      }
    });

  })();
</script>

<script>
(function algoliaCFSearchInputListenerUniversal() {
    // 1. CONFIGURATION & UNIVERSAL SELECTORS
    // Selects ALL inputs matching the placeholders, regardless of device visibility.
    var WHERE_INPUT_SELECTOR = 'input[placeholder="Anywhere"]';
    var WHEN_INPUT_SELECTOR = 'input[placeholder="Anytime"]';
    
    var RESULTS_COUNT_SELECTOR = 'div.flex-row.items-center.justify-between.px-0.md\\:px-\\[\\.5rem\\] > div:first-child';
    var EVENT_NAME = 'COPYalgolia_search_cruise_finder'; 
    var DEBOUNCE_TIME = 750; // Delay to wait for search results to settle

    var whereInputs = document.querySelectorAll(WHERE_INPUT_SELECTOR);
    var whenInputs = document.querySelectorAll(WHEN_INPUT_SELECTOR);
    
    var debounceTimer;

    // Check if we found ANY inputs
    if (whereInputs.length === 0 || whenInputs.length === 0) {
        //console.warn('GTM Input Listener: Not all input elements found.');
        return;
    }

    // Function to get the current combined signature (ES5 function)
    var getCurrentSignature = function() {
        var currentWhereValue = '';
        var currentWhenValue = '';
        
        // Loop through all 'Where' inputs to find the one with the non-empty, current value
        for (var i = 0; i < whereInputs.length; i++) {
            if (whereInputs[i].value.trim().length > 0) {
                currentWhereValue = whereInputs[i].value.trim();
                break;
            }
        }
        
        // Loop through all 'When' inputs to find the one with the non-empty, current value
        for (var i = 0; i < whenInputs.length; i++) {
            if (whenInputs[i].value.trim().length > 0) {
                currentWhenValue = whenInputs[i].value.trim();
                break;
            }
        }
        
        return currentWhereValue + '|' + currentWhenValue;
    };

    // 2. PERSISTENT STATE VARIABLE (Initialization uses the signature logic)
    var initialSignature = getCurrentSignature();
    var previousSignature;

    if (initialSignature === '|') {
        previousSignature = '|FIRST_LOAD|';
    } else {
        previousSignature = initialSignature;
    }
    
    // 3. CORE PUSH LOGIC
    var checkAndPush = function() {
        var newSignature = getCurrentSignature();

        // Only push if the query has actually changed and is not empty
        if (newSignature !== previousSignature && newSignature !== '|') {
            
            var searchType = (previousSignature === '|FIRST_LOAD|') ? 'initial' : 'refinement';

            var signatureParts = newSignature.split('|');
            var newWhere = signatureParts[0];
            var newWhen = signatureParts[1];
            
            // SCRAPE THE RESULTS TEXT
            var resultsElement = document.querySelector(RESULTS_COUNT_SELECTOR);
            var resultsText = resultsElement ? resultsElement.textContent.trim().replace(/\s+/g, ' ') : '(Results Element Missing)';

            // PUSH to Data Layer
            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            window.dataLayer.push({
                'event': EVENT_NAME,
                'search_type': searchType,
                'algolia_where_query': newWhere,
                'algolia_when_query': newWhen,
                'algolia_search_results': resultsText,
                'search_refinement_type': 'input'
            });

            // Update the state
            previousSignature = newSignature;
            //console.log('GTM Push (Input Change Universal): Event Sent for:', newSignature);
        }
    };
    
    // 4. EVENT HANDLER WITH DEBOUNCE
    var inputHandler = function() {
        if (debounceTimer) {
            clearTimeout(debounceTimer);
        }
        // Wait for user to stop typing AND for search results to update
        debounceTimer = setTimeout(checkAndPush, DEBOUNCE_TIME);
    };

    // 5. ATTACH LISTENERS TO ALL FOUND INPUTS (Input for typing, Change for modal selections)
    
    // Attach to all 'Where' inputs
    for (var i = 0; i < whereInputs.length; i++) {
        whereInputs[i].addEventListener('input', inputHandler);
        whereInputs[i].addEventListener('change', inputHandler);
    }
    
    // Attach to all 'When' inputs
    for (var i = 0; i < whenInputs.length; i++) {
        whenInputs[i].addEventListener('input', inputHandler);
        whenInputs[i].addEventListener('change', inputHandler);
    }
    
    //console.log('Universal input change listener attached to ' + (whereInputs.length + whenInputs.length) + ' fields.');
})();
</script>

<script>
  (function() {
    // List of API endpoints (case-insensitive check)
    var SUBMISSION_APIS = [
      '/api/footerform',
      '/api/brochure'
    ];

    // Helper to check if a URL is one of our submission APIs
    function isSubmissionAPI(url) {
      var i;
      if (!url) {
        return false;
      }
      for (i = 0; i < SUBMISSION_APIS.length; i++) {
        if (url.toLowerCase().indexOf(SUBMISSION_APIS[i]) > -1) {
          return true;
        }
      }
      return false;
    }

    // Function to determine formName based on formType (from request payload) and URL
    function determineFormName(url, formType) {
      // Priority 1: Brochure form is identified by its specific URL
      if (url.indexOf('/api/brochure') > -1) {
          return 'request-a-brochure';
      }
      // Priority 2: Use the raw formType from the request payload (e.g., "customer-care")
      if (formType && typeof formType === 'string') {
          return formType; 
      }
      
      return 'unknown-form-identifier';
    }

    // Function to push the custom data layer event
    function pushCustomSubmitEvent(url, responseData, formType) {
      var formName = determineFormName(url, formType);
      var submissionId = (responseData && responseData.result && responseData.result.submissionId) || null;
      
      // Data Layer Push
      window.dataLayer.push({
        'event': 'custom_form_submit',
          'form_submit_url': url,
          'form_name': formName, 
          'form_status': 'success',
          'form_submission_id': submissionId, 
          'form_data_object': responseData //this isn't being sent to GA4. may need to remove this, Jonathan will follow up on this        
      });
    }

    // Process a successful response (called by both fetch and XHR interceptors)
    function processResponse(url, data, formType) {
      if (isSubmissionAPI(url)) {
        // Check for the critical 'success' status within the JSON body
        if (data && data.status && String(data.status).toLowerCase() === 'success') {
          // Pass all three required pieces of data to the push function
          pushCustomSubmitEvent(url, data, formType); 
        }
      }
    }

    // --- XHR Interceptor (XMLHttpRequest.prototype) ---
    if (typeof window.XMLHttpRequest !== 'undefined' && !window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.__interceptedXHR) {
      var originalOpen = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open;
      var originalSend = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send;
      
      XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open = function(method, url) {
        this.__url = url; 
        originalOpen.apply(this, arguments);
      };

      XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send = function(data) {
        var self = this;
        var requestData = {};

        // Attempt to parse request payload to find formType
        if (typeof data === 'string') {
          try {
            requestData = JSON.parse(data);
          } catch(e) { /* ignore non-JSON data */ }
        }
        
        // Store the captured formType for later use
        self.__formType = requestData.formType || null; 

        if (self.__url && isSubmissionAPI(self.__url)) {
          self.addEventListener('load', function() {
            if (self.readyState === 4 && self.status >= 200 && self.status < 300 && self.responseText) {
              try {
                var responseData = JSON.parse(self.responseText);
                processResponse(self.__url, responseData, self.__formType);
              } catch (e) {
                // Ignore JSON parse errors
              }
            }
          });
        }
        originalSend.apply(this, arguments);
      };
      XMLHttpRequest.prototype.__interceptedXHR = true;
    }

    // --- FETCH Interceptor (Modern API) ---
    if (typeof window.fetch === 'function' && !window.fetch.__interceptedFetch) {
      var originalFetch = window.fetch;
      
      window.fetch = function() {
        var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);  
        var requestUrl = args[0] ? String(args[0]) : '';
        var options = args[1] || {};
        var requestData = {};
        var capturedFormType = null;
        
        // Attempt to capture formType from request body (common fetch pattern is JSON string in body)
        if (options.body && typeof options.body === 'string') {
            try {
              requestData = JSON.parse(options.body);
              capturedFormType = requestData.formType || null;
            } catch(e) { /* ignore non-JSON data */ }
        }

        return originalFetch.apply(this, args).then(function(response) {
          if (response.ok && isSubmissionAPI(requestUrl)) {
            var clonedResponse = response.clone();
            
            clonedResponse.json().then(function(data) {
              // Pass the captured formType along with the response data
              processResponse(requestUrl, data, capturedFormType); 
            }).catch(function(e) {
              // Ignore errors if the response is not JSON
            });
          }
          return response;
        });
      };
      window.fetch.__interceptedFetch = true;
    }
  })();
</script>

<script>
  (function() {
    var FORM_SELECTOR = 'form'; 
    var trackedForms = new Set();
    
    function getFormDestination(formElement) {
      // Safely check for the 'action' attribute, defaulting to the current URL
      return formElement.getAttribute('action') || window.location.href;
    }
    
    function handleFocus(event) {
      var field = event.target;
      var formElement = field.form || field.closest('form'); 
      
      if (!formElement) return;

      // --- FIX 1: SYNCHRONOUS LOCK CHECK ---
      // Check if this form has already been flagged as started. This prevents concurrent pushes.
      if (formElement.hasAttribute('data-gtm-started')) {
        return;
      }

      var formName = null;

      // --- CJS LOGIC REPLICATION START ---
      
      // 1. Priority Check: Look for the 'formType' hidden input 
      var formTypeInput = formElement.querySelector('input[name="formType"]');
      if (formTypeInput && formTypeInput.value) {
        formName = formTypeInput.value.trim().toLowerCase();
      }

      // 2. Fallback Check: Look for a button with "submit order" text (Brochure logic)
      if (!formName) {
        var submitButton = formElement.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');

        if (submitButton && submitButton.innerText) {
          var buttonText = submitButton.innerText.trim().toLowerCase();

          if (buttonText.includes('submit order')) {
            formName = 'request a brochure'; 
          }
        }
      }

      // --- CJS LOGIC REPLICATION END ---
      
      if (!formName || formName === 'unknown form identifier') {
        return;
      }
      
      // --- LOCK THE FORM & PUSH EVENT ---
      
      // Step A: Set the lock attribute on the form element to prevent re-firing
      formElement.setAttribute('data-gtm-started', 'true');

      // Step B: Stop propagation to prevent nested elements/containers from firing the listener again
      event.stopImmediatePropagation();

      // Step C: Push the Data Layer event
      window.dataLayer.push({
        event: "custom_form_start",
        
        form_name: formName, 
        
        eventModel: {
          form_id: formElement.id || '',
          form_name: formName, 
          form_destination: getFormDestination(formElement),
          first_field_id: field.id || '',
          first_field_name: field.name || '',
          first_field_type: field.type || field.tagName.toLowerCase(), 
          first_field_position: 1 
        }
      });
      
      // Add to the internal set (mostly for tracking in initializeFormTracking)
      trackedForms.add(formElement);
    }

    function initializeFormTracking() {
      var forms = document.querySelectorAll(FORM_SELECTOR);
      
      forms.forEach(function(form) {
        // If the form has already been tracked or has the lock attribute, skip listener attachment
        if (trackedForms.has(form) || form.hasAttribute('data-gtm-started')) return;
        
        // Target all standard interactive fields AND custom interactive elements
        var fields = form.querySelectorAll('input:not([type="hidden"]), select, textarea, [role="checkbox"]');
        
        fields.forEach(function(field) {
          // Listen for the focus event on any form field
          field.addEventListener('focus', handleFocus, { once: true });
        });
        
        // Add to internal list so we don't try to add listeners again during the next run
        trackedForms.add(form);
      });
    }

    // Use a Mutation Observer for SPAs to track dynamically added forms
    var observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
      initializeFormTracking();
    });

    observer.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });

    // Initial run for forms already present in the DOM
    initializeFormTracking();
  })();
</script>

<script>
(function () {
  // ================= CONFIG =================
  var EVENT_NAME = 'view_search_results';
 var TARGET_INDEX_FRAGMENT = 'amasitessearch';
  var DEBOUNCE_MS = 700;

  // ================= STATE =================
  var lastQuery = null;
  var debounceTimer = null;
  var pendingPayload = null;

  // ================= HELPERS =================
  function safeLower(v) {
    return typeof v === 'string' ? v.toLowerCase() : '';
  }

  function isAlgoliaRequest(url) {
    if (!url) return false;
    var u = safeLower(url);
    return (
      u.indexOf('/1/indexes/') > -1 &&
      u.indexOf('/queries') > -1 &&
      (
        u.indexOf('algolia.net') > -1 ||
        u.indexOf('algolianet.com') > -1
      )
    );
  }

  function parseJSON(v) {
    try { return JSON.parse(v); } catch (e) { return null; }
  }

  function normalizePayload(body) {
    if (!body) return null;

    if (typeof body === 'string') {
      return parseJSON(body);
    }

    if (typeof body === 'object') {
      if (body.requests && Object.prototype.toString.call(body.requests) === '[object Array]') {
        return body;
      }
      if (body._bodyInit && typeof body._bodyInit === 'string') {
        return parseJSON(body._bodyInit);
      }
    }
    return null;
  }

  function extractQuery(payload) {
    if (!payload || !payload.requests) return null;
    for (var i = 0; i < payload.requests.length; i++) {
      if (payload.requests[i].query) {
        return payload.requests[i].query.trim();
      }
    }
    return null;
  }

  function isFinalRequest(payload) {
    if (!payload || !payload.requests) return false;
    for (var i = 0; i < payload.requests.length; i++) {
      var r = payload.requests[i];
      if (r.hitsPerPage || r.highlightPreTag || r.highlightPostTag) {
        return true;
      }
    }
    return false;
  }

  // ================= DEBOUNCED PUSH =================
  function scheduleSearchPush(query, nbHits, indexName) {
    if (!query) return;

    var indexLower = safeLower(indexName);
    if (indexLower.indexOf(TARGET_INDEX_FRAGMENT) === -1) return;

    pendingPayload = {
      query: query,
      nbHits: nbHits
    };

    if (debounceTimer) {
      clearTimeout(debounceTimer);
    }

    debounceTimer = setTimeout(function () {
      var q = pendingPayload.query;

      var searchType =
        !lastQuery ? 'initial' :
        q !== lastQuery ? 'refined' :
        'repeat';

      lastQuery = q;

      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
        event: EVENT_NAME,
        search_term: q,
        search_type: searchType,
        search_results_count: pendingPayload.nbHits,
        search_provider: 'amaSitesSearch'
      });
      
      /* commentng out console log
      if (window.console && console.log) {
        console.log(' GA4 Algolia search committed:', q);
      }
      */
      
      pendingPayload = null;
    }, DEBOUNCE_MS);
  }

  // ================= XHR INTERCEPT =================
  try {
    if (window.XMLHttpRequest && !XMLHttpRequest.prototype.__algoliaSearchHooked) {
      var origOpen = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open;
      var origSend = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send;

      XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open = function (method, url) {
        this.__algoliaUrl = url;
        return origOpen.apply(this, arguments);
      };

      XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send = function (body) {
        if (this.__algoliaUrl && isAlgoliaRequest(this.__algoliaUrl)) {
          var payload = normalizePayload(body);
          var query = extractQuery(payload);
          var xhr = this;

          this.addEventListener('readystatechange', function () {
            if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status === 200 && query && isFinalRequest(payload)) {
              try {
                var json = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText);
                var res = json.results && json.results[0];
                if (res) {
                  scheduleSearchPush(query, res.nbHits, res.index);
                }
              } catch (e) {}
            }
          });
        }
        return origSend.apply(this, arguments);
      };

      XMLHttpRequest.prototype.__algoliaSearchHooked = true;
    }
  } catch (e) {}

  // ================= FETCH INTERCEPT =================
  try {
    if (window.fetch && !window.fetch.__algoliaSearchHooked) {
      var origFetch = window.fetch;

      window.fetch = function (input, init) {
        var url = typeof input === 'string' ? input : input && input.url;
        var body = init && init.body;

        if (url && body && isAlgoliaRequest(url)) {
          var payload = normalizePayload(body);
          var query = extractQuery(payload);

          return origFetch.apply(this, arguments).then(function (resp) {
            if (resp.status === 200 && query && isFinalRequest(payload)) {
              resp.clone().json().then(function (json) {
                var res = json.results && json.results[0];
                if (res) {
                  scheduleSearchPush(query, res.nbHits, res.index);
                }
              })["catch"](function () {});
            }
            return resp;
          });
        }

        return origFetch.apply(this, arguments);
      };

      window.fetch.__algoliaSearchHooked = true;
    }
  } catch (e) {}
})();
</script>

<script>
(function() {
    // --- CONFIGURATION ---
    var APP_ID_FRAGMENT = 'testingkct1buaumk';
    var TARGET_INDEX = 'itinerarydata';
    var AUTOCOMPLETE_INDEX = 'cruisefinderdropdowndatauat';
    var EVENT_NAME = 'TWOview_search_results';
    
    // --- V30 STATE MANAGEMENT ---
    // Stores the most recent text query from the autocomplete index until it's consumed by the TARGET_INDEX.
    var lastValidQuery = ''; 
    var lastFullQueryString = ''; 
    var throttleTimeout = null;
    var THROTTLE_DELAY_MS = 500; 

    // --- HELPER FUNCTIONS ---
    function safeToLower(s) {
        return (typeof s === 'string') ? s.toLowerCase() : '';
    }

    function isAlgoliaRequest(url) {
        if (!url) return false;
        var u = safeToLower(String(url));
        return u.indexOf(APP_ID_FRAGMENT) > -1 && u.indexOf('/1/indexes/') > -1 && u.indexOf('/queries') > -1;
    }

    function normalizePayload(body) {
        // Helper to consistently parse the request body
        if (!body && body !== '') return null;
        if (typeof body === 'object') {
            if (body.requests && Object.prototype.toString.call(body.requests) === '[object Array]') {
                return body;
            }
            if (body._bodyInit && typeof body._bodyInit === 'string') {
                try { return JSON.parse(body._bodyInit); } catch(e) {}
            }
            return null;
        }
        if (typeof body === 'string') {
            try { return JSON.parse(body); } catch (e) {
                var start = body.indexOf('{');
                var end = body.lastIndexOf('}');
                if (start > -1 && end > -1 && end > start) {
                    try { return JSON.parse(body.substring(start, end + 1)); } catch (e2) {}
                }
                return null;
            }
        }
        return null;
    }
    
    function isFinalAlgoliaRequest(payloadObj) {
        if (!payloadObj || !payloadObj.requests) return false;
        var request = payloadObj.requests[0];
        
        var indexName = safeToLower(request.indexName || '');
        if (indexName === TARGET_INDEX) {
            if (request.hitsPerPage || request.highlightPreTag || request.highlightPostTag) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

    function extractFilterData(payloadObj) {
        var facetValues = [];
        var facetTypes = [];
        var rawFilters = [];

        if (!payloadObj || !payloadObj.requests || !payloadObj.requests[0]) {
            return { rawFilters: [], facetValues: [], facetTypes: [] };
        }
        
        var facetFilters = payloadObj.requests[0].facetFilters;

        if (facetFilters && Object.prototype.toString.call(facetFilters) === '[object Array]') {
            
            facetFilters.forEach(function(filterGroup) {
                if (Object.prototype.toString.call(filterGroup) === '[object Array]') {
                    
                    filterGroup.forEach(function(filterStr) {
                        if (typeof filterStr === 'string' && filterStr.includes(':')) {
                            var parts = filterStr.split(':');
                            var type = parts[0].trim();
                            var value = parts.slice(1).join(':').trim(); 
                            
                            if (type && value) {
                                facetTypes.push(type);
                                facetValues.push(value);
                                rawFilters.push(filterStr);
                            }
                        }
                    });
                }
            });
        }
        
        return {
            rawFilters: rawFilters.sort(),
            facetValues: facetValues,
            facetTypes: facetTypes
        };
    }

    // --- CORE LOGIC: Dynamic Data Layer Push ---
    function pushSearchEvent(payloadObj, nbHits, indexNameRaw) {
        var indexNameLower = safeToLower(indexNameRaw);
        var request = payloadObj.requests[0];
        
        // --- 1. Intercept Autocomplete/Query Index (Index 1) ---
        if (indexNameLower === AUTOCOMPLETE_INDEX) {
            var newTextQuery = (typeof request.query === 'string') ? request.query.trim() : '';
            if (newTextQuery.length > 0) {
                // Store the valid query. This will be consumed by the next TARGET_INDEX event.
                lastValidQuery = newTextQuery;
            } else {
                // If the user actively clears the search box, clear the query.
                lastValidQuery = '';
            }
            return; 
        }
        
        // --- 2. Process Main Search Index (Index 2: TARGET_INDEX) ---
        if (indexNameLower !== TARGET_INDEX) {
            return; 
        }
        
        // V30: CONSUME the stored query from the autocomplete step
        var currentTextQuery = lastValidQuery;
        
        // Clear the stored query immediately so it's only used for this one event.
        lastValidQuery = ''; 

        // --- Get Full Current State for Comparison ---
        var filterData = extractFilterData(payloadObj); 
        
        // String used for comparison to determine search_type
        var currentFullQueryString = filterData.rawFilters.join('|') + '|Q:' + currentTextQuery;
        
        // --- Search Type Logic ---
        var searchType;
        if (lastFullQueryString.length === 0) {
            searchType = 'initial';
        } else if (currentFullQueryString === lastFullQueryString) {
            searchType = 'repeat';
        } else {
            searchType = 'refined';
        }

        // Update the last known state for the next request comparison
        lastFullQueryString = currentFullQueryString;

        // --- V29/V30: Advanced Filtering and Deduplication ---
        var filterTermsWithTypes = filterData.facetValues.map(function(value, index) {
            return {
                value: value,
                type: filterData.facetTypes[index]
            };
        });

        var uniqueAndRelevantFilterTerms = filterTermsWithTypes.filter(function(term) {
            var isDuplicate = safeToLower(term.value) === safeToLower(currentTextQuery);
            
            // Region Override: If a text query is present, ignore the structured 'region' filter.
            var isRegionOverride = safeToLower(term.type) === 'region' && currentTextQuery.length > 0;
            
            // Keep the term ONLY if it's NOT a duplicate AND NOT a region filter when text query is present.
            if (isDuplicate) return false;
            if (isRegionOverride) return false;

            return true;
        }).map(function(term) {
            return term.value;
        });

        var filterTermsString = uniqueAndRelevantFilterTerms.join(', ');
        
        // 3. Assemble the final search_term
        var finalSearchTerm = currentTextQuery;
        
        if (currentTextQuery && filterTermsString) {
            finalSearchTerm += ' | ' + filterTermsString;
        } else if (filterTermsString) {
            finalSearchTerm = filterTermsString;
        }

        // Final check to prevent empty events
        if (finalSearchTerm.length === 0) {
            return;
        }
        
        // Filter types are derived from all unique types in the original request for context
        var filterTypes = filterData.facetTypes.filter(function(v, i, a) {
            return a.indexOf(v) === i; 
        }).join(', ');
        
        var eventName = EVENT_NAME; 
        
        // V30: Debounce check
        if (throttleTimeout) {
            clearTimeout(throttleTimeout);
        }
        
        throttleTimeout = setTimeout(function() {
            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            window.dataLayer.push({
                'event': eventName, 
                'search_term': finalSearchTerm,
                'search_type': searchType,
                'search_results_count': typeof nbHits === 'number' ? nbHits : null,
                'search_provider': 'itineraryData',
                'filter_types': filterTypes 
            });

            console.log(' Cruise Finder V30 captured (Guaranteed Query Attribution):', { 
                event: eventName, 
                type: searchType, 
                term: finalSearchTerm, 
                provider: 'itineraryData' 
            });
            throttleTimeout = null;

        }, THROTTLE_DELAY_MS);
    }

    // --- INTERCEPTOR LOGIC (Handles XHR and Fetch) ---
    function handleResponse(payload, resp, isXHR) {
        if (resp.status === 200) { 
            (isXHR ? Promise.resolve(JSON.parse(resp.responseText)) : resp.clone().json())
            .then(function(json) {
                var resultZero = json.results && json.results[0];
                var indexName = (resultZero && resultZero.index) ? resultZero.index : 
                                (payload.requests && payload.requests[0] ? payload.requests[0].indexName : null);
                
                var nbHits = (resultZero && typeof resultZero.nbHits !== 'undefined') ? resultZero.nbHits : null;
                
                pushSearchEvent(payload, nbHits, indexName);
            }).catch(function() {});
        }
    }


    try {
        // XHR hook
        if (window.XMLHttpRequest && !window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.__algoliaInterceptedV30) {
            var origOpen = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open;
            var origSend = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send;

            XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open = function(method, url) {
                this.__url = url;
                return origOpen.apply(this, arguments);
            };

            XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send = function(body) {
                if (this.__url && isAlgoliaRequest(this.__url)) {
                    var normalized = normalizePayload(body);
                    var payload = normalized; 
                    var xhr = this;
                    var listener = function() {
                        if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status === 200) {
                            handleResponse(payload, xhr, true);
                        }
                    };
                    this.addEventListener('readystatechange', listener, false);
                }
                return origSend.apply(this, arguments);
            };
            window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.__algoliaInterceptedV30 = true;
        }
    } catch (e) { console.error('XHR Interceptor Setup Failed:', e); }

    try {
        // fetch hook
        if (window.fetch && !window.fetch.__algoliaInterceptedV30) {
            var origFetch = window.fetch;
            window.fetch = function(input, init) {
                var url = (typeof input === 'string') ? input : (input && input.url ? input.url : null);
                var body = (init && typeof init.body !== 'undefined') ? init.body : (typeof input === 'object' ? input : null);

                if (url && body && isAlgoliaRequest(url)) {
                    var normalized = normalizePayload(body);
                    var payload = normalized; 

                    return origFetch.apply(this, arguments).then(function(resp) {
                        handleResponse(payload, resp, false);
                        return resp;
                    });
                }
                return origFetch.apply(this, arguments);
            };
            window.fetch.__algoliaInterceptedV30 = true;
        }
    } catch (e) { console.error('Fetch Interceptor Setup Failed:', e); }
})();
</script>

tag.name: Custom HTML - PostMessage - Send Locale to Iframe from Parent

parameter.value:
<script>
(function() {
  // CONFIGURATION
  var MAX_ATTEMPTS = 10;  // Waits up to 10 times (5 seconds total)
  var attempt = 0;
  var interval = 1000;     // Checks every half-second

  function sendLocale() {
    try {
      var iframe = document.querySelector('iframe[title="Booking Engine"]'); 
      
      if (!iframe) {
        attempt++;
        if (attempt < MAX_ATTEMPTS) {
          // If iframe not found, schedule the next retry
          console.warn('POSTMESSAGE SENDER: Iframe not yet found (Attempt ' + attempt + '). Retrying...');
          setTimeout(sendLocale, interval);
        } else {
          // Failed after all attempts
          console.error("POSTMESSAGE SENDER: Failed to find iframe after " + MAX_ATTEMPTS + " attempts. Abandoning.");
        }
        return; 
      }

      // --- Iframe found! ---
      
      var parentUrl = window.location.pathname;
      var match = parentUrl.match(/\/[a-z]{2}\/?\b/i); 
      var locale = match ? match[0].replace(/\//g, '').replace(/\b/g, '') : 'us'; 

      var messageData = {
          source: 'ParentLocaleSender',
          localeData: locale
      };

      // Send the message
      iframe.contentWindow.postMessage(
        messageData, 
        'https://book1.amawaterways-uat.com' 
      );
      
      // CONSOLE CONFIRMATION & DEBUG PUSH (Fires in Parent GTM Debugger)
      console.log("POSTMESSAGE SENT: Successful (Attempt " + attempt + "). Locale:", locale);

      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
          'event': 'parent_locale_sent_debug',
          'parent_locale': locale,
          'sendAttempt': attempt
      });
      
    } catch (e) {
      console.error("POSTMESSAGE SENDER ERROR:", e);
    }
  }

// --- KEY CHANGE: Increase the initial delay before starting the retries ---

// We delay the very first check by 1000ms (1 second) to account for 
// the slow rendering of the entire CFE widget during a History Change.
setTimeout(sendLocale, 2000); //changing to 2 seconds to account for user refreshing the CBE page

// Note: If you have already increased MAX_ATTEMPTS to 10 in the tag, 
// the script will now wait 1s, then start checking every 500ms for 5 seconds total.
// This gives the iframe a much larger window to load during the History Change transition.

})();
</script>

<script>
  // **KEY CHANGE: PERSISTENT FLAG**
  // This flag ensures the code only runs the DL push one time.
  var localeReceived = false;

  window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
    // 0. CHECK DE-DUPLICATION FLAG
    if (localeReceived) {
        return; // Ignore all subsequent messages if we've already processed one.
    }

    // 1. SECURITY CHECK: Verify the sender's origin.
    if (event.origin !== 'https://www1.amawaterways-uat.com') { 
      return; 
    }
    
    // 2. DATA CHECK: Check for the unique identifier and the data key.
    if (event.data.source === 'ParentLocaleSender' && event.data.localeData) {
      
      // 3. PUSH TO DATA LAYER: Makes the data available for GTM variables and tags.
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
        'event': 'DEDUPEparent_locale_received', // Custom Event Trigger Name
        'parent_locale': event.data.localeData
      });

      // 4. SET FLAG TO TRUE AFTER SUCCESSFUL PUSH
      localeReceived = true;
    }
  });
</script>

<script>
/**
 * Universal PostMessage Debug Listener
 * This script is for debugging only. It listens for ALL messages 
 * sent to the iframe and logs them to the console, allowing you 
 * to identify existing messages from the Parent application.
 */

(function() {
  var MESSAGE_LOGS = [];
  
  window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
    var origin = event.origin || 'Unknown Origin';
    var data = event.data;
    
    // Check for standard event messages GTM might push (like gtm.message or gtm.js)
    if (typeof data === 'object' && data !== null && data.event && (data.event.startsWith('gtm.') || data.event.startsWith('firebase.'))) {
        // We often see GTM internal events being pushed; ignore those to reduce noise
        return; 
    }
    
    var logEntry = {
        timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
        origin: origin,
        // Stringify complex data for clean console output
        data: typeof data === 'object' ? JSON.stringify(data) : data,
        dataType: typeof data
    };
    
    MESSAGE_LOGS.push(logEntry);
    
    // Log the message clearly to the console
    console.groupCollapsed('POSTMESSAGE DETECTED (Iframe)');
    console.log('Timestamp:', logEntry.timestamp);
    console.log('Origin:', logEntry.origin);
    console.log('Data Type:', logEntry.dataType);
    console.log('Raw Data:', data);
    console.groupEnd();
    
  });
  
  // Expose the log for manual inspection in the console
  window._postMessageLogs = MESSAGE_LOGS;
  console.info('Universal PostMessage Listener Active. Check window._postMessageLogs for all recorded messages.');
})();
</script>

<script>
// This is the iframe code
(function () {
  //per-spec we need to know the expected origin of the parent
  //or the message will be rejected
  
  //parent domain 
  //  - Production : amawaterways.com
  //  - Lower Environments : amawaterways-*.com

  //parent subdomain
  //  - Production : www
  //  - Lower Environments : www1

  //we will share the origin of the parent window with the iframe

  //compute the expected origin of the parent window
  var expectedParentOrigin = "";
  var currentDomainSeparated = window.location.hostname.split(".");
  if (currentDomainSeparated.length !== 3) {
    console.error("Unexpected domain format:", window.location.hostname);
    return;
  }

  var topLevelDomain = currentDomainSeparated[2];
  var secondLevelDomain = currentDomainSeparated[1];
  var subdomain = currentDomainSeparated[0];

  var isProduction = secondLevelDomain === "amawaterways";

  if (isProduction) {
    //production environment
    if (subdomain !== "book") {
      console.error("Unexpected subdomain for production:", subdomain);
      return;
    }
    expectedParentOrigin = "https://www." + secondLevelDomain + "." + topLevelDomain;
  } else {
    //lower environments
    if (subdomain !== "book1") {
      console.error("Unexpected subdomain for lower environments:", subdomain);
      return;
    }

    expectedParentOrigin = "https://www1." + secondLevelDomain + "." + topLevelDomain;
  }



  function handleWindowMessage(event) {
    console.log('CHILD expected parent origin is: ' + expectedParentOrigin);
   console.log('CHILD received this messaage: ', event.data);
    if (event.origin !== expectedParentOrigin) {
      console.error("CHILD Received message from unexpected origin:", event.origin);
      return;
    }

    //check if event.data.type is `parent-info`
    //if so extract the locale from event.data.locale
    
    if (event.data && event.data.type === "parent-info") {
      var locale = event.data.locale;
      console.log("CHILD Received locale from parent:", locale);
      //perform any additional actions needed with the locale

      //----------------------------------
      //perform actions based on the message received
      //----------------------------------
             
      // 3. PUSH TO DATA LAYER: Makes the data available for GTM variables and tags.
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
        'event': 'parent_locale_received', // NEW Custom Event Trigger Name
        'parent_locale': event.data.locale
      
    });
  }
 }
  


  //start listening for messages from the parent window
  //we need to do this before notifying the parent that we are ready
  //or we might miss the response
  window.addEventListener("message", handleWindowMessage, false);

  //now that we are listening for messages, notify the parent that we are ready
 console.log('sending postMessage to: ', expectedParentOrigin);
 window.parent.postMessage("cbe-iframe-ready", expectedParentOrigin);
})();
</script>

(function() {
  // 1. Create a global buffer variable (scoped to the iframe's window)
  window.lastCruiseData = null; 

  const originalLog = console.log;

  /**
   * Override console.log to store the relevant data object
   */
  console.log = function(...args) {
    originalLog.apply(console, args); // Always display the log in the console

    const logString = String(args[0]);

    // 2. Check if the log message is the one we want
    if (logString.includes('cruise component subscription updated') && args.length > 1) {
      const cruiseDataObject = args[1]; // This is the structured data object

      // Perform a safety check for the key properties
      if (typeof cruiseDataObject === 'object' && cruiseDataObject !== null && cruiseDataObject.igpId) {
        // 3. Store the object in our global buffer
        window.lastCruiseData = cruiseDataObject;
        
        // Optional: Confirm in the console that the data was stored
        originalLog(' Stored new cruise data buffer:', window.lastCruiseData);
      }
    }
  };
})();
</script>

(function() {
  // Helper function to safely push data to the Data Layer
  function pushToDataLayer(data) {
    if (window.dataLayer && Array.isArray(window.dataLayer)) {
      window.dataLayer.push(data);
    }
  }

  // The button is likely loaded dynamically, so wait for the DOM to be ready
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    //  Use the specific and reliable class from your HTML
    const nextButton = document.querySelector('button.next-btn'); 

    if (nextButton) {
      nextButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
        
        // 1. Read data from the buffer created in Step 1 (console override)
        const cruiseData = window.lastCruiseData;

        // Safety check to ensure the required data is present
        if (!cruiseData || !cruiseData.cruise || !cruiseData.category) {
          console.error(' Cannot fire AddToCart: Cruise data buffer (window.lastCruiseData) is missing.');
          return; 
        }

        // 2. Define and push the AddToCart event
        const dataLayerEvent = {
          event: 'addToCart',
          ecommerce: {
            currency: 'USD',
            // Using a price point from the captured object
            value: cruiseData.category.doublePrice,

              // Use specific IDs/Codes from the captured object
              item_id: cruiseData.cruise.packageCode,
              item_name: cruiseData.cruise.genericName,
              item_category: 'Cruise',
              item_variant: cruiseData.category.categoryCode,
              quantity: cruiseData.pax,
              price: cruiseData.category.doublePrice
            }]
          }
        };

        console.log(' AddToCart event fired using buffered data.'); 
      });

    } else {
      console.warn(' NEXT button (button.next-btn) not found when DOMContentLoaded fired.');
    }
  });
})();

<script type='text/gtmscript'>
(function() {
  const NEXT_BUTTON_SELECTOR = 'button.next-btn';
  let observer = null; 

  // Helper function to safely push data to the Data Layer
  function pushToDataLayer(data) {
    if (window.dataLayer && Array.isArray(window.dataLayer)) {
      window.dataLayer.push(data);
      console.log(` DL Push SUCCESS: Event '${data.event}'`);
    } else {
      console.error(' DL Push FAILED: window.dataLayer is not available.');
    }
  }

  // --- Scrape Logic (from section 1) ---
  function getScrapedData() {
      // 1. Get Pax/Quantity
      const paxElement = document.querySelector('input[name="pax"][aria-checked="true"]');
      const quantity = paxElement ? parseInt(paxElement.value) : 1; 
      
      // 2. Get Total Price
      const totalElement = document.querySelector('reservation-summary .summary-table tbody tr:last-child td:last-child');
      let totalPrice = 0;
      if (totalElement) {
          const totalText = totalElement.textContent.trim().replace('$', '').replace(',', '');
          totalPrice = parseFloat(totalText) || 0;
      }

      // 3. Calculate Per Person Price
      const perPersonPrice = quantity > 0 ? totalPrice / quantity : 0;
      
      // 4. Get Cruise Name
      const cruiseNameElement = document.querySelector('.selected-cruise-bg td:nth-child(3)');
      const cruiseName = cruiseNameElement ? cruiseNameElement.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown Cruise Name';

      // 5. Hardcoded or best-guess IDs (REQUIRES VERIFICATION)
      // Check the selected cruise row for data attributes that hold 'KC270201U' and 'L'
      const packageCode = 'KC270201U'; 
      const categoryCode = 'L';         
      
      return {
          quantity,
          cruiseName,
          packageCode,
          categoryCode,
          perPersonPrice,
          currency: 'USD'
      };
  }

  /**
   * Attaches the click listener and constructs the Data Layer object
   */
  function attachClickListener(buttonElement) {
    if (observer) {
        observer.disconnect(); // Stop watching the DOM once the button is found
        console.log(' MutationObserver disconnected.');
    }

    buttonElement.addEventListener('click', function() {
        
      const data = getScrapedData();

      if (data.perPersonPrice === 0) {
        console.error(' Cannot fire AddToCart: Scraped price is zero or invalid.');
        return; 
      }

      // Construct the dataLayer object using scraped values
      const dataLayerEvent = {
        event: 'DOMadd_to_cart', 
        ecommerce: {
          currency: data.currency,
          value: data.perPersonPrice, 
          items: [{
            item_id: data.packageCode,
            item_name: data.cruiseName,
            item_category: 'Cruise',
            item_variant: data.categoryCode,
            quantity: data.quantity,
            price: data.perPersonPrice
          }]
        }
      };

      pushToDataLayer(dataLayerEvent);
      console.log(' AddToCart event (add_to_cart) fired using DOM scraped data.', dataLayerEvent); 
    }, {once: true}); 

    console.log(' Click listener attached to NEXT button via MutationObserver.');
  }

  /**
   * Starts the MutationObserver to watch for the button's appearance
   */
  function startObserver() {
    if (observer) return; // Only start once

    const targetNode = document.body; 
    const config = { childList: true, subtree: true };

    const callback = function(mutationsList, observerInstance) {
        for (const mutation of mutationsList) {
            if (mutation.type === 'childList') {
                // Check if the NEXT button has been added
                const button = document.querySelector(NEXT_BUTTON_SELECTOR);
                if (button) {
                    attachClickListener(button);
                    return;
                }
            }
        }
    };

    observer = new MutationObserver(callback);
    observer.observe(targetNode, config);
    console.log(' MutationObserver started, waiting for NEXT button...');
  }
  
  // Start the entire process immediately
  startObserver();
  
})();
</script>

<script type='text/gtmscript'>
(function() {
  const NEXT_BUTTON_SELECTOR = 'button.next-btn';
  let observer = null; 

  function pushToDataLayer(data) {
    if (window.dataLayer && Array.isArray(window.dataLayer)) {
      window.dataLayer.push(data);
      console.log(` DL Push SUCCESS: Event '${data.event}'`);
    } else {
      console.error(' DL Push FAILED: window.dataLayer is not available.');
    }
  }

  // --- Core DOM Scraping Function ---
  function getScrapedData() {
      const summaryTable = document.querySelector('.summary-table tbody');
      if (!summaryTable) {
          console.error('Reservation summary table not found.');
          return null;
      }

      // Helper function to find the value (next <td>) given a label (<td> text)
      const getValueByLabel = (label) => {
          const labelCell = Array.from(summaryTable.querySelectorAll('td')).find(td => td.textContent.trim() === label);
          return labelCell ? labelCell.nextElementSibling?.textContent.trim() : null;
      };
      
      // Helper to parse "Date City -" text into separate components AND clean the city name
      const parseCityAndDate = (text) => {
          if (!text) return { date: 'N/A', city: 'N/A' };
          const parts = text.split(/\s+/);
          const datePart = parts.slice(0, 3).join(' '); // e.g., "04 Jan 2027"
          // City part starts from the 4th word. Strip trailing hyphen and whitespace.
          const cityPart = parts.slice(3).join(' ').replace(/\s*-$/, '').trim(); 
          return { date: datePart, city: cityPart };
      };

      // 1. DYNAMIC PRIMARY DATA
      
      // Get Pax/Quantity (using the corrected selector based on your HTML)
      const guestsText = getValueByLabel('Guests');
      const quantity = parseInt(guestsText) || 2; 

      // Get Total Charges (e.g., "$10,896.00")
      const totalElement = summaryTable.querySelector('tr:last-child td:last-child');
      let totalPrice = 0;
      if (totalElement) {
          const totalText = totalElement.textContent.trim().replace('$', '').replace(',', '');
          totalPrice = parseFloat(totalText) || 0;
      }
      
      // Calculate Per-Person Price (used for 'price' and 'value' in items)
      const unitPrice = quantity > 0 ? totalPrice / quantity : totalPrice; 
      
      // 2. CRUISE & CATEGORY DETAILS
      const itineraryText = getValueByLabel('Itinerary');
      const categoryText = getValueByLabel('Category'); 
      
      // Split the category text: catalogueName is the first part ("Suite")
      const catalogueName = categoryText ? categoryText.split(' - ')[0].split(',')[0].trim() : 'Unknown Category';
      
      // --- Dynamic Codes ---
      // item_id is now the unique itinerary name + price, as package code is unavailable.
      const itemID = `${itineraryText} | ${catalogueName}`; 
      // item_variant uses the full description (or the cleaned name) as the code is unavailable.
      const itemVariant = catalogueName; 

      // 3. CITIES & DATES
      const embarkationText = getValueByLabel('Embarkation');
      const disembarkationText = getValueByLabel('Disembarkation');
      const embarkData = parseCityAndDate(embarkationText);
      const disembarkData = parseCityAndDate(disembarkationText);


      return {
          quantity,
          unitPrice,
          cruiseName: itineraryText || 'Unknown Itinerary',
          itemID: itemID,
          itemVariant: itemVariant,
          catalogueName: catalogueName,
          startDate: embarkData.date,
          endDate: disembarkData.date,
          embarkCity: embarkData.city,
          disembarkCity: disembarkData.city,
          currency: 'USD'
      };
  }

  /**
   * Attaches the click listener and constructs the Data Layer object
   */
  function attachClickListener(buttonElement) {
    if (observer) {
        observer.disconnect(); 
        console.log(' MutationObserver disconnected.');
    }

    buttonElement.addEventListener('click', function() {
        
      const data = getScrapedData();

      if (!data || data.unitPrice === 0) {
        console.error(' Cannot fire AddToCart: Scraped data is missing or price is zero.');
        return; 
      }

      // Construct the dataLayer object
      const dataLayerEvent = {
        event: '3DOMadd_to_cart', 
        ecommerce: {
          currency: data.currency,
          // Value is the total price for GTM, or the unit price depending on preference.
          // We will use the unit price as the standard item value.
          value: data.unitPrice, 
          items: [{
            item_id: data.itemID,
            item_name: data.cruiseName,
            item_category: data.catalogueName,
            item_variant: data.itemVariant,
            quantity: data.quantity,
            price: data.unitPrice
          }]
        },
        cruise_details: {
            start_date: data.startDate,
            end_date: data.endDate,
            embark_city: data.embarkCity,
            disembark_city: data.disembarkCity
        }
      };

      pushToDataLayer(dataLayerEvent);
      console.log(' AddToCart event (add_to_cart) fired using DOM scraped data.', dataLayerEvent); 
    }, {once: true}); 

    console.log(' Click listener attached to NEXT button via MutationObserver.');
  }

  /**
   * Starts the MutationObserver immediately upon script execution
   */
  function startObserver() {
    if (observer) return;

    const targetNode = document.body; 
    const config = { childList: true, subtree: true };

    const callback = function(mutationsList) {
        for (const mutation of mutationsList) {
            if (mutation.type === 'childList') {
                const button = document.querySelector(NEXT_BUTTON_SELECTOR);
                if (button) {
                    attachClickListener(button);
                    return;
                }
            }
        }
    };

    observer = new MutationObserver(callback);
    observer.observe(targetNode, config);
    console.log(' MutationObserver started, waiting for NEXT button...');
  }
  
  // Start the entire process immediately
  startObserver();
})();
</script>

<script>
// This is code is expected to execute within the iframe

//enable this flag to see debug logs related to country code detection
var DEBUG_COUNTRY_DETECTION = false;

(function () {
  var maybeCountryCode = TryGetCountryFromTLD();
  if (maybeCountryCode) {
    console.info("Country code determined from TLD:", maybeCountryCode);
    CreateCountryCodeDataLayerEvent(maybeCountryCode, "tld");
    return;
  }

  maybeCountryCode = TryGetCountryFromPath();
  if (maybeCountryCode) {
    console.info("Country code determined from Path:", maybeCountryCode);
    CreateCountryCodeDataLayerEvent(maybeCountryCode, "path");
    return;
  }

  TryGetCountryFromParentWindow();
})();


function CreateCountryCodeDataLayerEvent(countryCode, countryCodeSource) {
  if (!countryCode) {
    console.warn("Attempted to push empty country code to dataLayer");
    return;
  }

  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  window.dataLayer.push({
    'event': 'parent_locale_received', // NEW Custom Event Trigger Name 'parent_locale': event.data.locale
    'country_code_source': countryCodeSource || 'unknown',
    'parent_locale': countryCode
  });
}


function TryGetCountryFromParentWindow () {
  if(window.top === window.self) {
    console.info("Child iframe code is running in a top-level window. Bailing out.", window.location);
    return;
  }

  //we need to know the expected origin of the parent or the message will be rejected

  //parent domain 
  //  - Production : amawaterways.com
  //  - Lower Environments : amawaterways-*.com

  //parent subdomain
  //  - Production : www
  //  - Lower Environments : www1

  //we will share the origin of the parent window with the iframe

  //compute the expected origin of the parent window
  var expectedParentOrigin = "";
  var currentDomainSeparated = window.location.hostname.split(".");
  if (currentDomainSeparated.length !== 3) {
    console.warn("Unexpected domain format:", window.location.hostname);
    return;
  }

  var topLevelDomain = currentDomainSeparated[2];
  var secondLevelDomain = currentDomainSeparated[1];
  var subdomain = currentDomainSeparated[0];

  var isProduction = secondLevelDomain === "amawaterways";
  var expectedChildSubdomain = isProduction ? "book" : "book1";
  var expectedParentSubdomain = isProduction ? "www" : "www1";

  if (subdomain !== expectedChildSubdomain) {
    console.error("Unexpected subdomain for child iframe:", subdomain);
    return;
  }

  expectedParentOrigin = "https://" + expectedParentSubdomain + "." + secondLevelDomain + "." + topLevelDomain;

  debugLog('Child iframe expects parent origin: ' + expectedParentOrigin);

  function handleWindowMessage(event) {
    debugLog('Child iframe received this message ' + event.origin + ' ' + event.data);

    if (event.source !== window.parent) {
      console.warn("Child iframe received message from unexpected source window.");
      return;
    }

    if (event.origin !== expectedParentOrigin) {
      console.warn("Child iframe received message from unexpected origin:", event.origin);
      return;
    }

    //check if event.data.type is `parent-info`
    //if so extract the locale from event.data.locale

    if (event.data && typeof event.data === "object" && event.data.type === "parent-info") {
      var locale = event.data.locale;
      console.info("Child iframe received locale from parent", locale);
      //perform any additional actions needed with the locale

      //----------------------------------
      //perform actions based on the message received
      //----------------------------------

      CreateCountryCodeDataLayerEvent(locale, "parent-window");
      window.removeEventListener("message", handleWindowMessage, false);
    }
    else {
      debugLog('Child iframe received non parent-info message.');
    }
  }



  //start listening for messages from the parent window
  //we need to do this before notifying the parent that we are ready
  //or we might miss the response
  window.addEventListener("message", handleWindowMessage, false);

  //now that we are listening for messages, notify the parent that we are ready
  debugLog('sending postMessage to: ' + expectedParentOrigin);
  window.parent.postMessage("cbe-iframe-ready", expectedParentOrigin);
}



function TryGetCountryFromTLD() {
  var COUNTRY_BY_TLD = {
    'uk': 'uk',
    'ca': 'ca',
    'au': 'au',
    'nz': 'nz',
    'eu': 'eu'
  };

  var hostnameParts = window.location.hostname.split('.');
  var currentTld = hostnameParts[hostnameParts.length - 1];
  return COUNTRY_BY_TLD[currentTld] || null;
}

//the country code might also be in the path stored as a 
//two-letter code in the first segment of the path
function TryGetCountryFromPath() { 
  var pathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/");
  if (pathSegments.length >= 2) {
    if (pathSegments[1].length === 2) {
      return pathSegments[1];
    } else {
      console.warn("Expected two-letter locale in path but found:", pathSegments[1]);
    }
  }

  return null;
}


function debugLog(message) {
  if (DEBUG_COUNTRY_DETECTION && typeof console !== 'undefined' && console.debug) {
    console.debug(message);
  }
}
</script>

Copy of Custom HTML - Algolia Filter Bar Interactions using cta_click

parameter.value:
<script>
/**
 * This script listens for the existing 'cta_click' Data Layer event 
 * and maps it to the specific 'algolia_filter_interactions' event.
 */
(function() {
  // We use a Data Layer 'push' wrapper to intercept events
  var originalPush = window.dataLayer.push;
  
  window.dataLayer.push = function(obj) {
    // 1. Process the original event first
    var result = originalPush.apply(window.dataLayer, arguments);

    // 2. Check if this is the cta_click event we want to bridge
    if (obj && obj.event === 'cta_click' && obj.cta_value) {
      var ctaValue = obj.cta_value; // e.g., "Filter Interests: Wine"

      // Only proceed if it's a filter interaction and NOT a 'clear' action
      if (ctaValue.toLowerCase().includes('filter') && !ctaValue.toLowerCase().includes('clear')) {
        
        // Extract the name (e.g., "Wine") from "Filter Interests: Wine"
        var filterName = ctaValue.includes(':') 
          ? ctaValue.split(':').pop().trim() 
          : ctaValue.trim();

        // 3. Push your specific Algolia event using the extracted data
        originalPush.call(window.dataLayer, {
          'event': 'algolia_filter_interactions',
          'algolia_filter_selections': filterName,
          'search_refinement_type': 'filter',
          'search_type': 'refinement'
        });
      }
    }
    return result;
  };
})();
</script>

tag.name: Copy of Custom HTML - Algolia Filter Modal Interactions - using cta_click

parameter.value:
<script>
  /**
 * Bridges existing 'cta_click' events to 'algolia_filter_interactions'.
 * Extracts Category and Selection from strings like "Filter Arrival City: Barranquilla"
 */
(function() {
  var originalPush = window.dataLayer.push;
  
  window.dataLayer.push = function(obj) {
    // 1. Process the original cta_click event first
    var result = originalPush.apply(window.dataLayer, arguments);

    // 2. Filter for specific filter selection events
    if (obj && obj.event === 'cta_click' && obj.label) {
      var label = obj.label; 
      
      // Validation: Label must start with "Filter " 
      // AND it must not be the 'Open Modal' button (slot: itinerary-filter-open-modal)
      var isFilterAction = label.indexOf('Filter ') === 0;
      var isNotModalOpen = obj.dataAttributes && obj.dataAttributes.slot !== 'itinerary-filter-open-modal';
      var isNotClear = label.toLowerCase().indexOf('clear') === -1;

      if (isFilterAction && isNotModalOpen && isNotClear) {
        
        // --- PARSING LOGIC ---
        // Input Example: "Filter Arrival City: Barranquilla"
        
        // Step A: Remove "Filter " -> "Arrival City: Barranquilla"
        var cleanLabel = label.replace(/^Filter\s+/i, ''); 
        
        var category = 'General';
        var selection = cleanLabel;

        // Step B: Split by colon to separate Category from Value
        if (cleanLabel.indexOf(':') > -1) {
          var parts = cleanLabel.split(':');
          category = parts[0].trim(); // Result: "Arrival City"
          selection = parts[1].trim(); // Result: "Barranquilla"
        }

        // 3. FINAL DATA LAYER PUSH
        // This will fire immediately after the selection is made in the modal.
        originalPush.call(window.dataLayer, {
          'event': 'algolia_filter_interactions',
          
          // Example: "Barranquilla" (or "Wine", "7 Nights", etc.)
          'algolia_filter_selections': selection,
          
          // Example: "Arrival City" (or "Interests", "Duration", etc.)
          'algolia_filter_categories': category,
          
          'search_refinement_type': 'filter',
          'search_type': 'refinement',
          
          // Added to distinguish this from the old passive dismissal logic
          'filter_action_type': 'modal_selection_click' 
        });
      }
    }
    return result;
  };
})();
</script>

    // Go through all the rows in the table, do the tests,
    // and return the return value of the FIRST successful
    // match.
    for (var i = 0, len = table.length; i < len; i += 1) {
        var regex = new RegExp(table[i][0], table[i][2]);
        if (regex.test(inputVariable)) {
            return table[i][1];
        }
    }
    return defaultVal;
}

]
